titleStmt.title: A plea for the life of dying religion from the word of the Lord in a sermon preached to the General Assembly of the colony of the Massachusets at Boston in New-England, May 16, 1683, being the day of the election there / by Mr. Samuel Torrey ...
titleStmt.author: Torrey, Samuel, 1632-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Samuel Green for Samuel Sewall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
